title: fraud detection solution
extract: You typically have a window of less than one second to spot and stop a potentially fraudulent transaction. ... But with multiple channels and millions of transactions per day, it takes an incredibly fast fraud detection software solution to process transactions quickly enough.
extract_html: You typically have a window of less than one second to spot and stop a potentially fraudulent transaction. ... But with multiple channels and millions of transactions per day, it takes an incredibly fast fraud detection software solution to process transactions quickly enough.
